dialogue.introduction: Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki! Thanks for having me! Fubuki here! Thanks for having me today as well. (Kai) Thank you very much, it's Fubuki! Yes, I'll do my best! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.library_intro: I am Fubuki, the first ship of the Special Type destroyers designed under the Washington Naval Treaty. We were superior to existing ship classifications and shocked the world. Based on our design, many following fleet-type destroyers were built. Yes sir, I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary1: Thanks for the good work, Commander! Ready anytime, commander! (Kai) Is it time to sortie? I'll do my best! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.secretary2: What would you like me to do next? Yes sir! Preparations are complete, Commander! (Kai)
dialogue.secretary3: C-commander...? Whaat is iiiit, Mutsuki-chan? Eh, er... Commander!? (Kai)
dialogue.secretaryidle: Main gun, check. Torpedo tube, check. Engine, no problem! *whew* next was... Ah! that's right, let's check the coast too. Hmm... (Kai)
dialogue.secretarymarried: I did it! I hope you are not too tired, Commander! Umm... this one is cooked by Fubuki herself. I wonder if you could eat this. H-Here you are... (Kai)
dialogue.wedding: Umm… Hey…. Commander… I… really… l-l-li… no... I have total faith in you! Yes!
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander, a message has arrived. Reviewing the communique, Commander? (Kai)
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: I'll be the one to finish them off! I'll definitely be the one to finish them off! Setting sail! (Kai) Fubuki of Destroyer Division 11, sortieing! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.equipment1: Thank you very much! I'll try even harder! Ah...! Thank you very much! (Kai) Thank you very much, Commander. (Kai Ni)
dialogue.equipment2: For the Commander, I'll do my best! I will do my very best! (Kai) This equipment... with this, I'll do even better! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.supply: Thank you very much. I'll do even better. Thank you very much, Commander. With this, I'll do my best! (Kai)
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll be resting for a bit.
dialogue.docking_complete: Commander. a ship has finished docking!
dialogue.ship_construction: Oh! It seems like there's a new friend?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It seems that the operation has completed. Operation complete. Thank you very much! (Kai)
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Everyone! Are you ready? Sortieing! Everyone, are you ready? (Kai)
dialogue.attack: Hit~! Yeah, I will protect everyone! (Kai)
dialogue.night_battle: Oxygen torpedoes, open fire! Prepare for torpedo attack. Pursue the enemy. (Kai) Transitioning to pursuit attack. Please follow me! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.night_attack: Please! Please hit! Please! Please hit! (Kai)
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Please! Please hit! Please! Please hit! (Kai)
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Please! Please hit! Please! Please hit! (Kai)
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Please! Please hit! Please! Please hit! (Kai)
dialogue.mvp: I did it! It's all thanks to the Commander!
dialogue.christmas_2014: Christmas...? So this is Christmas!? Commander, it's so beautiful! The trees are pretty too!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year, Admiral! I'll work even harder this year!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Um, Commander, this, please accept it! N-no! It's chocolate!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, today is an important day to us! I'm happy that you were together with us, yes!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It's raining today, too. I guess it can't be helped since it's the rainy season. Right, let's do some training! Yeah! Hm? The Shiratsuyu-class girls seem to be happy.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Gather up, Special Type Destroyers! We'll begin our Summer Training! Pair up. Ah... Oh, right! You'll pair with me! Okay?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Eh? Commander, going to visit the shrine? Ah, excuse me, I'm going to help Mamiya-san prepare the Toshikoshi Soba later at her place. If you'd like, please come eat. I will give you a large serving.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Commander! Let's play Japanese Badminton. The one who will lose will get X drawn on the face with ink. I won't lose!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Fubuki will give her best in Setsubun as well! Target found, I'm going to throw! Uryaa! The hit has been confirmed, target is silent! I did it! E-Eeeh.
dialogue.valentines_day_2016: Commander, today is Valentine's day, isn't it? I made a big chocolate heart for you, here! Huh? Aaah! Somehow, it's melted!

hourly.0000: Commander, the date has changed. Today, I, Fubuki, will be timekeeper.
hourly.0200: It's 0200! Commander, at this time, the base is quiet, isn't it?
hourly.0300: It's 0300. Eh, me? Ah, yes, I'm fine! I'm not getting sleepy!
hourly.0400: It's... 0-4... 00... na....?! No, no! Yes! Fubuki is full of energy!
hourly.0500: It's 0500! Commander, these morning hours feel great, don't they! Yes!
hourly.0600: It's 0600! Getting up with all your power, right! Rising up! The fleet, rising up with all its strength!
hourly.0700: It's 0700! Commander, here is your breakfast. It's a Japanese-style breakfast. This morning, it's miso soup and potatoes!
hourly.0800: It's 0800! Alright, with that, the dishes are washed... Yes! Commander, Fubuki's sortie preparations are complete!
hourly.0900: It's 0900! Shirayuki-chan, Hatsuyuki-chan, are you ready? Commander, the 11th Destroyer Division is ready to sortie at any time!
hourly.1000: It's 1000! Akagi-san... always looks so wonderful! Someday, I'll be sortieing with her as an escort ship... Ahh..! It's a dream! A dream!
hourly.1100: It's 1100! It'll be lunchtime really soon. What should today's lunch be... Commander, how about the usual curry?
hourly.1200: It's 1200! Commander, Fubuki made some curry! How is it? There are carrots and onions... Aaah, that's it! The secret ingredient... Ah! Have some seconds!
hourly.1300: It's 1300! What are this afternoon's strategy developments? Fleet sortie compositions... Oh, Commander, are you getting tired?
hourly.1400: It's 1400! Oh, Furutaka-san, what's the matter? Huh? Aoba-san? Hmm... I haven't seen her. ...Ah, yes!
hourly.1500: It's 1500! Yes, Furutaka-senpai really does things well. She's a kind person. Oh! It's Aoba-san! Aoba-saaaan!
hourly.1600: It's 1600! Aoba-san, a little while ago, Furutaka-san was looking for you. Is everything alright? Huh, she went off... um...
hourly.1700: It's 1700! Commander, the sunset is pretty, isn't it? It will be time for dinner soon, and a meal hasn't been prepared yet. Oh, you'll treat me to dinner tonight?
hourly.1800: It's 1800. I'm feeling nervous eating out with the Commander ... Um, a knife and fork... these are used out there, aren't they?
hourly.1900: It's 1900! Commander, this consommé soup is hot and delicious! This salad, too... It's Western-style and looks smart, doesn't it?
hourly.2000: It’s 2000! I’m full, Commander! Ah, from here, I must work hard to return the favor. Yes! Fubuki will continue to do her best!
hourly.2100: It's 2100! Oh, it's Yura-san! She's wonderful, isn't she? Shirayuki-chan and the rest of us are all grateful to her, yes!
hourly.2200: 2200... Eh, was that a dream? I want to become stronger; to be able to protect everyone... If peace comes... I want us to always be basking in the sun.
hourly.2300: It's 2300. Commander, what did you dream of? Mm... Is that so? That's great ♪ It was the same for me, yes!
